home.title: Lights, Camera, Action!
home.subtitle: The Virtual Warehouse for Visual Mavericks.

home.equipmentRentalsDesc: From cameras to lights, we have everything you need to bring your visual communication projects to life.
home.equipmentManagementDesc: Our system allows you to track and manage equipment usage, repairs, and inventory with ease.
home.procurementDesc: Need to book a room? Our procurement system has got you covered.
home.faqsDesc: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions about using the virtual warehouse system.
home.termsDesc: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of SCE's virtual warehouse website.
home.contactUsDesc: Need assistance? Get in touch with our support team for help with any issues or inquiries.
